## useRemirrorManager variable

A low level context picker to obtain the manager from within a RemirrorManager context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useRemirrorManager: <GExtension extends import("@remirror/core").Extension<any, any> = any>() => ExtensionManager<GExtension>
```
